org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class BaseOAuth20Client<U extends OAuth20Profile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
        • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuth20Client<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OAuthCredentials,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CasOAuthWrapperClient, FacebookClient, FoursquareClient, GitHubClient, Google2Client, LinkedIn2Client, PayPalClient, VkClient, WindowsLiveClient, WordPressClient

    public abstract class BaseOAuth20Client<U extends OAuth20Profile>
extends BaseOAuthClient<U>
    This class is the base implementation for client supporting OAuth protocol version 2.0.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
